text:

أرسل 7240 للاشتراك

trans:
Unlimited social 📲
Unlimited internet 🌍
Unlimited local calls 📞
Unlimited text messages ✉️
___
Sawa Star Plus (240 riyals)
Send 7240 to subscribe
Unlimited social 📲
130 GB Internet 🌍 (100 GB after the offer ends)
1200 minutes to all networks 𑠊___
Sawa Flex 240 (240 SAR)
Send 7241 to subscribe
Unlimited social 📲
105 GB Internet 🌍
2000 local and international minutes to 19 countries 📞
___
Sawa Flex 340 Package (340 SAR)
1000 local and international minutes
90 G internet
110 G social
To subscribe, send 7242
Send "Flex 340" to find out which 19 countries are covered.
___
Sawa Post Plus (170 SAR)
Send 7170 to subscribe
Unlimited social 📲
74 GB Internet 🌍 (40 GB after the offer ends)
